title: Drawing, "End Table, Round"
medium: Graphite and blue color pencil on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite
markings: Stamps: Stamp in black ink at lower left: DONALD DESKEY/ 145 WEST 57TH STREET/ NEWYORK CITY
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite erased at lower right: WIDDICOMB; inscribed in graphite at lower left: WOOD COMB./ MAHOGANY OR ACACIA OR LACQUER/ POL. CHROM. TUBE; inscribed dimensions, instructions; inscribed in graphite in lower right: SCALE 1" - 1'-0"/7798 [circled]; inscribed in red color pencil at lower right: P
description: Perspective, plan, and elevation for small circular end table. Two circular platforms at top and base below connected by polished chrome tube. Surface of table in either mahogany, acacia, or lacquer. Table surface slightly wider than base.
